title: Orasatha Usuratha Lyrics English Meaning 7UP Madras Gig Album
stanzas:
Orasatha Usuratha Lyrics English Meaning 7UP Madras Gig Album

Lyrics in Thanglish
Oru murai enna paathu
orak kannil pesu

nee nerungi vandha
kadhal vaasam
en usuru moththam
unna pesum

Orasatha usurathan
urukkaadha manasathan
alasaatha, en satta kizhinji
veliye parakkum idhayam

verukkaatha, kanavellaam
sirikkaatha
enavittu velagaatha
thariketta manasu
unna thaedi alaiyum

adiye...
adiye...

otti irundha nizhal
ottaama un pinna alaiyum
un mutta muli moracha
munnooru oosi
ulla irangum

kattuveeriyanukku
kadhal onnu vandha adangum.
en kutti idhayathula
nee thonda pakkura surangam

neeyum enna neengi pona
neela vaanam kanneer sindhum
pesaama thaan
pogaathadi nee
paasaangu thaan
pannaathadi

sathiyama un nenappil
moochu mutti thikkurendi
kovam yethi
kollaathadi
koththi koththi thinnaathadi

Orasatha usurathan
urukkaadha manasathan
alasaatha, en satta kizhinji
veliye parakkum idhayam

verukkaatha, kanavellaam
sirikkaatha
enavittu velagaatha
thariketta manasu
unna thaedi alaiyum

adiye...
adiye...

English Translation
see me once,
speak with your eyes

fragrance of love
when you come close.
My entire soul
will talk with you.

Don't rub my soul
Don't melt my mind
Don’t wash, my heart
will flew tearing my shirt.

Don’t hate me
Don't laugh in dream
Don’t go away
My mind will
roam searching you.

Hey girl..
Hey girl ..

my shadow will leave
and come behind you.
When you stare with big eyes
I feel pain of pushing
needles In me.

Kattuveeriyan snake
will be calm if it loves.
you’re trying to dig
mine in my small heart.

If you leave me
The blue sky will cry.
Don't go without
saying a word,
Don't you pretend
Like that…

Your thought
Makes me breathless,
Don’t kill by increasing
my anger.
Don’t peck and eat me.

Don't rub my soul
Don't melt my mind
Don’t wash, my heart
will flew tearing my shirt.

Don’t hate me
Don't laugh in dream
Don’t go away
My mind will
roam searching you.

Hey girl..
Hey girl ..
